page.title: 18Industry
page.content: There is not a great deal of industrial activity in the area.However, in common with many villages in Leicestershire, the area has some knitwear factories.The most notable such unit is the Couture factory in Stoney Stanton. There are a few other very small units in that village involved in the industry.In the village are two garages and a marine engineering factory.In Croft there is the huge Croft Quarry ,the largest synite quarry in Europe.There is also a small modern industrial estate making such items as sports clothing ,special sheet steel,and the retailing of oil products.Next to the Fosse Way is a county council depot dealing with major road repairs and other similar activities.To the north of the area isolated from any houses is a large Calor gas depot.
